Microsoft.IoT.Devices

Open Source version of the GitHub Pages theme (jekyll version)

About

Download .zip Download .tar.gz View on GitHub
This page, about/index.html, is an example of a named html file. Named files are not placed in _posts/.

Remember that this is not a markdown file so `_posts/` will not work like it does in _posts/*.md. Instead, you need to use <code>_posts/</code>.
tactile-theme is maintained by jasonlang
jekyll-tactile-theme is maintained by ankur-gupta
This page was generated by GitHub Pages. Tactile theme by Jason Lang.
